# Government Tender Announcement

## Health Canada - Office Furniture Required at Halifax

### Tender Details

* Reference: PW-22-01007169
* Solicitation Number: 1000244293
* Tender Closing Date: **2022-09-28T14:00:00**
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Region of Opportunity: Nova Scotia

### Tender Description

Health Canada invites bids for the supply of office furniture at Halifax. This procurement is conducted under the Supplier’s Furniture for Workspaces Supply Arrangement (SA) issued by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

### Contracting Entity

* Name: Health Canada
* Address:
	+ Address Locator: 0900C2
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: Ontario
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0K9
	+ Country: Canada

### Point of Contact

* Name: Rene Beauchamp
* Email: [rene.beauchamp@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:rebeauchamp@hc-sc.gc.ca)

### Attachments

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal and any amendments, can be downloaded from:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/14/1532071c3e0065909881cefb9fa09bcd/npp_1000244293_-_eng.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/14/e1a5003a70aed9eb1002dfba7962737e/rfb_1000244293_-_eng.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/14/bb694bfab5403e1d235ca274dfc66bf8/apm_1000244293_-_fr.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/14/a94abdbf2085850fc9ddb2aec947ca51/ias_1000244293_-_fr.pdf (French)
